link_desc:
This WMI-powered template can used to low-level discovery ROOT\HPQ classes and fetch data from instance's metrics.

Currently supported HP Insight Management classes:

  • HP_WinComputerSystem
  • HP_ComputerSystemPackage
  • HP_BIOSElement
  • HP_Power
  • HP_Fan
  • HP_ILo
  • HP_NumericSensor
  • HP_MemoryModule
  • HP_EthernetPort
  • HP_Processor
  • HPSA_DiskDrive

Note

LLD rules & indexed WMI arrays must processed with external PowerShell utility: wmi_helper.ps1

You need to install HP Insight Management WBEM Providers before template using.
author: sadman
